moves.3. Nf3 d6: This move was recommended by Bobby Fischer. However, my opponent is not Bobby Fischer.
moves.4. Bc4 Be7: Threatening Bh4+, which will prevent white from castling.
moves.6... O-O 7. d4 Bg4: White regains the pawn, with superior development.
moves.9... dxe5 10. dxe5 Qxd1 11. Raxd1: Here, Black should play ... Bc5+ followed by ... Nh5 and then Black gains the upper hand.
moves.11... Ne8: A horrible retreat, typical of the "scaredy cat" personality. The knight on e8 now has no squares.
moves.12. Be3: Preventing Bc5+, but sacrificing a pawn
moves.12... Bxf3 13. gxf3: White has the bishop pair as compensation.
moves.13... Nxe5 14. Bb3 Bd6 15. Ne4: If White exchanges knight for bishop, then White will have a better endgame.
moves.15... a6 16. Nxd6 Nxd6 17. Rd5 Ng6 18. f: Threatening f5 and taking the e5 square away from the Black knight
moves.18... Rfe8 19. Bd4: White's bishops are pointing directly at the Black king.
moves.19... Ne7 20. Rg5: Here f6 is impossible due to the pin.
moves.20... g6: Now black is weak on the dark squares.
moves.21. Be5 Nc6: Black must give up the bishop. If Bc3, then ... Ne4, forking bishop and rook.
moves.22. Bxd6 cxd6: Black's d-pawn is now isolated and weak.
moves.23. Rd1 Re4: Black counters by attacking White's weak pawn.
moves.26... Kh7 27. Rgxd6: White is now 2 pawns up and has Bishop against Knight.
moves.27... Re4e1+ 28. Rxe1 Rxe1+: Black simplifies the position with an exchange of rooks.
moves.29. Kf2 Re7: Black puts his rook into a passive position.
moves.30. Rf6: White increases the pressure on the f7-pawn.
moves.30... Kg7 31. Rf4: This stops the centralizing move Nd4.
moves.34... Ne5: The knight fork was more tempting for Black.
moves.35... f6 36. Be2 Rc7 37. c4: The move c4 is much stronger than c3.
moves.37... Kg6 38. h5+ Kh6 39. b4: White expands on the Queenside, trying to create another passed pawn.
moves.39... Re7: Rd7 is much better (White would replay with Ke3). Instead, Black self-pins himself.
moves.40. c5: Black ran out of time here, but the ending is hopeless for Black.
